title: Watford's Isaac Success joins Malaga on loan
description: Out-of-favour Watford forward Isaac Success will spend the rest of the season on loan at Malaga.
content: The 22-year-old has not played in the Premier League since May of last year, and will head back to La Liga for four months.Success, who moved to Vicarage Road in the summer of 2016, has made one first-team appearance for the Hornets this season, playing 45 minutes during an EFL Cup match in August.Under former Watford manager Walter Mazzarri, Success featured in 19 Premier League games during 2016-17.Before moving to England, he had spent two years in Spain playing for Granada, scoring seven times.He has won one cap for Nigeria, coming on as a substitute against Senegal in March 2017.Get Sky Sports from Â£18 a month and watch the latest transfers live in action for their new teams
